00021 namespace hope {
00022     namespace detail {
00023 
00027         struct tuple_tag {
00028         };
00029 
00035         template<typename T, size_t I>
00036         struct indexed_value {
00037             constexpr indexed_value() = default;
00038 
00039             constexpr indexed_value(indexed_value &&) = default;
00040 
00041             constexpr indexed_value(const indexed_value &) = default;
00042 
00043             ~indexed_value() = default;
00044 
00045             template<typename Vt>
00046             explicit constexpr indexed_value(Vt &&valueRef)
00047                     : value(std::forward<Vt>(valueRef)) {
00048                 static_assert(std::is_constructible_v<T, Vt>,
00049                               "hope::indexed_value: given object is not suitable as initializer"
00050                 );
00051             }
00052 
00053             T value;
00054         };
00055 
00056         template<typename, typename... Ts>
00057         class flat_tuple_impl;
00058 
00064         template<std::size_t... Is, typename... Ts>
00065         class flat_tuple_impl<std::index_sequence<Is...>, Ts...> : public tuple_tag, public indexed_value<Ts, Is> ... {
00066             using self_t = flat_tuple_impl<std::index_sequence<Is...>, Ts...>;
00067             constexpr static type_list<std::decay_t<Ts>...> types{}; // only clear types might be used, thus make it clear here
00068 
00069             template<std::size_t I>
00070             using native_t = std::decay_t<typename decltype(get_nth_type<I>(types))::Type>;
00071         protected:
00072             using flat_tuple = flat_tuple_impl<std::index_sequence<Is...>, Ts...>;
00073 
00074             constexpr flat_tuple_impl() = default;
00075             constexpr flat_tuple_impl(const flat_tuple_impl &) = default;
00076             constexpr flat_tuple_impl(flat_tuple_impl &&) = default;
00077 
00078             ~flat_tuple_impl() = default;
00079 
00080             template<typename... VTs>
00081             constexpr flat_tuple_impl(VTs &&... elems) noexcept
00082                     : indexed_value<Ts, Is>(std::forward<VTs>(elems))... {}
00083 
00084         public:
00085             constexpr static std::size_t tuple_size{size(types)};
00086 
00098             template<typename T, typename NativeT = std::decay_t<T>>
00099             [[nodiscard]] constexpr decltype(auto)
00100             get() noexcept {
00101                 static_assert(contains<NativeT>(types));
00102                 constexpr auto TypeIndex = find<NativeT>(types);
00103                 using value_t = typename decltype(deduce_type<NativeT, TypeIndex>())::Type;
00104                 return get_impl<TypeIndex, value_t>();
00105             }
00106 
00118             template<typename T, typename NativeT = std::decay_t<T>>
00119             [[nodiscard]] constexpr decltype(auto)
00120             get() const noexcept {
00121                 static_assert(contains<NativeT>(types));
00122                 constexpr auto TypeIndex = find<NativeT>(types);
00123                 using value_t = typename decltype(deduce_type<NativeT, TypeIndex>())::Type;
00124                 return get_impl<TypeIndex, value_t>();
00125             }
00126 
00133             template<size_t N>
00134             [[nodiscard]] constexpr decltype(auto)
00135             get() noexcept {
00136                 static_assert(tuple_size > N);
00137                 using value_t = typename decltype(deduce_type<native_t<N>, N>())::Type;
00138                 return get_impl<N, value_t>();
00139             }
00140 
00147             template<size_t N>
00148             [[nodiscard]] constexpr decltype(auto)
00149             get() const noexcept {
00150                 static_assert(tuple_size > N);
00151                 using value_t = typename decltype(deduce_type<native_t<N>, N>())::Type;
00152                 return get_impl<N, value_t>();
00153             }
00154 
00160             template<typename F>
00161             constexpr void for_each(F &&f) const {
00162                 (f(get<Is>()), ...);
00163             }
00164 
00171             template<typename F>
00172             constexpr void for_each(const flat_tuple &tuple2, F &&f) const {
00173                 (f(get<Is>(), tuple2.template get<Is>()), ...);
00174             }
00175 
00181             template<typename F>
00182             constexpr void for_each(F &&f) {
00183                 (f(get<Is>()), ...);
00184             }
00185 
00192             template<typename F>
00193             constexpr void for_each(flat_tuple &tuple2, F &&f) {
00194                 (f(get<Is>(), tuple2.template get<Is>()), ...);
00195             }
00196 
00201             [[nodiscard]] static constexpr auto get_size() noexcept {
00202                 return tuple_size;
00203             }
00204 
00205         private:
00206 
00213             template<std::size_t N, typename NativeT>
00214             [[nodiscard]] constexpr decltype(auto)
00215             get_impl() const noexcept {
00216                 return static_cast<const NativeT &>(
00217                         static_cast<const indexed_value<NativeT, N> &> (*this).value
00218                 );
00219             }
00220 
00227             template<std::size_t N, typename NativeT>
00228             constexpr decltype(auto)
00229             get_impl() noexcept {
00230                 return static_cast<NativeT &>(
00231                         static_cast<indexed_value<NativeT, N> &> (*this).value
00232                 );
00233             }
00234 
00241             template<typename T, std::size_t I>
00242             [[nodiscard]] constexpr auto deduce_type() const noexcept {
00243                 // we cannot unambiguous determine holding type, thus try to cast to value and ref, and const ref...
00244                 if constexpr (std::is_base_of_v<indexed_value<T, I>, self_t>)
00245                     return type_holder<T>{};
00246                 else if constexpr (std::is_base_of_v<indexed_value<T &, I>, self_t>)
00247                     return type_holder<T &>{};
00248                 else
00249                     return type_holder<const T &>{};
00250             }
00251         };
00252 
00253         template<typename... Ts>
00254         using flat_tuple_t = flat_tuple_impl<std::make_index_sequence<size(type_list<Ts...>{})>, Ts...>;
00255     }
00256 
00262     template<typename... Ts>
00263     class flat_tuple final : public detail::flat_tuple_t<Ts...> {
00264     public:
00265         template<typename... VTs,
00266                 typename = std::enable_if_t<std::is_same_v<type_list<std::decay_t<VTs>...>, type_list<std::decay_t<Ts>...>>>>
00267         constexpr flat_tuple(VTs &&... elems) noexcept
00268                 : detail::flat_tuple_t<Ts...>(std::forward<VTs>(elems)...) {}
00269 
00270         constexpr flat_tuple()
00271                 : detail::flat_tuple_t<Ts...>() {}
00272     };
00273 
00274     template<typename... Ts>
00275     flat_tuple(Ts...)->flat_tuple<Ts...>;
00276 
00284     template<typename... Ts>
00285     constexpr auto make_flat_tuple(Ts &&... args) {
00286         return flat_tuple<std::decay_t<Ts>...>(std::forward<Ts>(args)...);
00287     }
00288 
00295     template<typename... Ts>
00296     constexpr auto make_flat_tuple_bitfield_friendly(Ts... args) {
00297         return flat_tuple<std::decay_t<Ts>...>(std::forward<Ts>(args)...);
00298     }
00299 
00306     template<typename... Ts>
00307     constexpr auto make_flat_ref_tuple(Ts &&... args) {
00308         return flat_tuple<Ts...>(std::forward<Ts>(args)...);
00309     }
00310 
00320     template<typename Tuple, typename F>
00321     constexpr std::enable_if_t<std::is_base_of_v<detail::tuple_tag, std::decay_t<Tuple>>>
00322     for_each(Tuple &&tuple, F &&f) {
00323         tuple.for_each(std::forward<F>(f));
00324     }
00325 
00337     template<typename Tuple, typename F>
00338     constexpr std::enable_if_t<std::is_base_of_v<detail::tuple_tag, std::decay_t<Tuple>>>
00339     for_each(Tuple &&tuple1, Tuple &&tuple2, F &&f) {
00340         tuple1.for_each(std::forward<Tuple>(tuple2), std::forward<F>(f));
00341     }
00342 }
